page.title: 11RECREATION (1)
page.content: RECREATION In this area there is a Seaboard Hall and a Tennis Court.In the Seaboard Hall a lady comes once a week to teach adults how to play badminton.It costs fifty pence but you have to supply your own racket. There is a Tennis Court and a lady comes on a Monday to teach the top two classes of the primary school how to play tennis.But any other days anyone can play on the court. On a Wednesday evening in the Seaboard Hall there is a Youth Club. From six - seven o'clock young people from the age of seven to twelve can go to play snooker,darts,tabletennis and pool.Then from seven till nine o'clock older people can go.You can also buy Coke and crisps to eat and drink.
